channel.title: [PI] Prayer Book Problem
channel.description:
I was wondering if anyone had a fix for using normal pray then switching to ancients and being able to use both prayer books at once, i either would like it so you cant or when you click on the alter your prayer gets put to 0...
If anyone could help that would be awesome
